Reviews.Title: The Nikon 1j1 is a camera.
Reviews.Author: Greg Linck
Reviews.Content: I am a photographer I have us a cannon for those photos I want to sell. If you are a series photographer  This is a fun way to add to your photo works. It give me the ability to do all such as, vids, stills and slide shows. I love it for is conveyance.

ProductInfo.Features:
Includes 10-30mm & 30-110mm Lenses
Includes Sandisk 8GB Class 10 Card
Includes OEM Nikon White Bag
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon J1 10.1MP Mirrorless White Digital Camera Deluxe Bundle. Includes ** 10-30mm lens ** 30-110mm zoom Lens ** 8GB SD Card ** And Nikon Deluxe Camera Bag **
